** SOLD **

I am switching to SGC New Label Slabs in my home office Display.

I have a PSA-2.5 Green Portrait Cobb and looking to Trade/Upgrade plus CASH into a SGC-3/3.5 Cobb Green Portrait in the New SGC Slab.

Would also sell for $5,140 firm

See scans of my PSA-2.5 Green Cobb Portrait in the Flickr Album below:

[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157714456674726"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157714456674726[/URL]

Please reply to my email below ... Steve

[url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]
